definition: to assign (to a class)/to classify as/to include

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: How is the difficulty level for each word determined?
sentences.chinese: 每个词汇是如何归入不同的难度等级的？

sentences.english: This supercilious attitude relegates me to the level of the commonplace.
sentences.chinese: 这种目空一切的心态把我归入大路货的档次。

sentences.english: This item belongs under a different heading.
sentences.chinese: 这一项应归入不同的类目。

sentences.english: Polypodiaceae A family of terrestrial or epiphytic leptosporangiate ferns.
sentences.chinese: 有时归入水龙骨科或珠蕨科。

sentences.english: According to doctors, some diseases fall into the category of stress-related illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 医生认为，一些疾病应归入压力造成的疾病范畴。

sentences.english: These questions may be included in the same category.
sentences.chinese: 这些问题可以归入一类。

sentences.english: All the recent talk about the faltering economy certainly seems to fall into the bad-news category.
sentences.chinese: 一切对于无力经济的讨论似乎都可归入坏消息一类。

sentences.english: Accounts Receivable are often classified as current assets.
sentences.chinese: 应收帐款通常归入流动资产。

sentences.english: That means that all logic belongs within a service.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着所有逻辑应归入一个服务。

sentences.english: Botanists refer this flower to the rose family.
sentences.chinese: 植物学家将这花归入蔷薇科。

sentences.english: Policies are grouped into policy groups based on business and access control requirements.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据业务和访问控制要求将策略归入策略组中。

sentences.english: The material which is of no consequence will be relegated to appendices.
sentences.chinese: 那些无关紧要的材料将被归入附录中。

sentences.english: Criminalizing such conduct would threaten the freedom of the press, he said.
sentences.chinese: 将这类接触归入刑事犯罪，将危及新闻自由，他表示。

sentences.english: Surviving Death Eaters will have to be brought to justice or reintegrated into magical society.
sentences.chinese: 那些残存的食死徒要么绳之于法要么归入魔法社会。

sentences.english: This plant belongs to the daisy family.
The prosecution was brought under the emergency act.
sentences.chinese: 这起控诉归入紧急法令。

definition: to belong to/affiliated to/to result in sth/to incline towards
to bring into/to channel into/to integrate into/to incorporate
to be collectively called/collective term/general designation
to view as/to see as/to consider to be/to deem
to incorporate into one's troops/to weave in
